Key Match Events: Denzel Dumfries scored the equalizing goal in the 89th minute
Virgil van Dijk was sent off in the 85th minute, leaving the Netherlands with 10 men
Post-Match Reflections: Denzel Dumfries praised the team for their fight and resilience
Van Dijk explained his actions to the referee as respectful
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hungary's Roland Sallai scored the opening goal in the 32nd minute
The Netherlands had over 80% possession in the first half but struggled to create clear chances
